description: This is a React component named Layout that provides a structured page layout with a sidebar, topbar, and main content area. It manages user state, handles logout functionality, and uses React Router for navigation.

methods.name: Layout({ children, title, subtitle })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a page layout with navigation, user info, and content area.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Layout({ children, title, subtitle }) {$/
